import sys
from collections import deque

def dfs(u, p, g, dist, adj, vis):
    vis[u] = True
    for v, d in adj[u]:
        if v == p:
            continue
        dist[v] = dist[u] + d
        dfs(v, u, g, dist, adj, vis)

def bfs(s, g, dist, adj, vis):
    q = deque()
    q.append(s)
    vis[s] = True
    while q:
        u = q.popleft()
        for v, d in adj[u]:
            if not vis[v]:
                dist[v] = dist[u] + d
                q.append(v)
                vis[v] = True

def solve():
    n = int(input())
    g = list(map(int, input().split()))
    adj = [[] for _ in range(n)]
    for _ in range(n - 1):
        u, v, d = map(int, input().split())
        u -= 1
        v -= 1
        adj[u].append((v, d))
        adj[v].append((u, d))

    ans = 0
    for i in range(n):
        dist = [0] * n
        vis = [False] * n
        bfs(i, g[i], dist, adj, vis)
        dp = [0] * n
        dp[i] = g[i]
        for j in range(n):
            if not vis[j]:
                continue
            for k in range(n):
                if not vis[k]:
                    continue
                dp[j] = max(dp[j], dp[k] + dist[j] - dist[k])
        ans = max(ans, max(dp))

    print(ans)

solve()
